pages.text: Sharks are Aggressive Mobs that roam the Deepest Oceans. They appear to swim slowly until they have a target, if you are the target, you are Doomed. The Shark will gain lightning speed and dart towards its prey dealing enourmous damage and a bleed effect.$(br2)Sharks will attack all other Sea Creatures, The Player and Boats. If you manage to Kill a Shark it will drop a Shark Tooth, which can be used to Craft Potions Of Bleeding in a Potion Stand.
